languages.text: {n}На их побелевших лицах я читаю понимание и готовность внимать. Наконец-то. Я указываю на Топку, Гниль и Рапиру, и мне не нужно ничего говорить. Толпа выдыхает сама:{/n} "Изменники!"

{n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"
languages.original_text: {n}На их побелевших лицах я читаю понимание и готовность внимать. Наконец-то. Я указываю на Топку, Гниль и Рапиру, и мне не нужно ничего говорить. Толпа выдыхает сама:{/n} "Изменники!"

traits.locale_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"
{n}On their whitened faces I at last read understanding and willingness to listen. I point to Furnace, Mildew, and Rapier, and I need not say anything. The crowd exhales on its own:{/n} "Traitors!"

{n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Mildew, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

{n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Mildew, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

{n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

{n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

{n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

languages.text: {n}Endlich erkenne ich in ihren blassen Gesichtern einen Hauch von Verstehen und Bereitschaft, zuzuhören. Ich deute auf Glutofen, Fäule und Rapier, und ich weiß, dass keine Worte erforderlich sind, denn die Menge spricht es für mich aus:{/n} "Verräter!"
languages.original_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Endlich erkenne ich in ihren blassen Gesichtern einen Hauch von Verstehen und Bereitschaft, zuzuhören. Ich deute auf Glutofen, Mehltau und Rapier, und ich weiß, dass keine Worte erforderlich sind, denn die Menge spricht es für mich aus:{/n} "Verräter!"

languages.text: {n}Por fin, percibo un destello de comprensión y una disposición a escuchar en sus rostros pálidos. Señalo a Horno, Podredumbre y Estoque, y sé que no necesito decir nada en cuanto la muchedumbre habla por mí:{/n} «¡Traidores!».
languages.original_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Por fin, percibo un destello de comprensión y una disposición a escuchar en sus rostros pálidos. Señalo a Horno, Moho y Estoque, y sé que no necesito decir nada en cuanto la muchedumbre habla por mí:{/n} «¡Traidores!».

languages.text: {n}ようやく理解して、その青白い顔の面々の言葉をすっと受け入れ、ファーネス、ロット、レイピアを指差す。言葉は必要ない…群衆が代わりに口を開いた。{/n}「裏切り者め！」
languages.original_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ようやく理解して、その青白い顔の面々の言葉をすっと受け入れ、ファーネス、カビ、レイピアを指差す。言葉は必要ない…群衆が代わりに口を開いた。{/n}「裏切り者め！」

languages.text: {n}到了最后，我在人群苍白的脸上看到了理解与倾听的光芒。我指着“熔炉”、“脓疮”和“刺剑”。我知道，我无需多言，因为人们会高声吼出我的声音。{/n}“打倒叛徒！”
languages.original_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

traits.locale_text: {n}到了最后，我在人群苍白的脸上看到了理解与倾听的光芒。我指着“熔炉”、“霉毯”和“刺剑”。我知道，我无需多言，因为人们会高声吼出我的声音。{/n}“打倒叛徒！”

languages.text: {n}Je perçois enfin dans leurs visages blafards une lueur de compréhension et de réceptivité. Je désigne Fournaise, Pourriture et Rapière en sachant que nulle parole n'est nécessaire. La foule s'exclame à ma place :{/n} « Traîtres ! »
languages.original_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Je perçois enfin dans leurs visages blafards une lueur de compréhension et de réceptivité. Je désigne Fournaise, Moisissure et Rapière en sachant que nulle parole n'est nécessaire. La foule s'exclame à ma place :{/n} « Traîtres ! »

languages.text: {n}En nihayetinde solgun yüzlerinde bir nebze de olsa anlayış ve dinleme niyeti seziyorum. Fırın'ı, Çürük'ü ve İnce Kılıç'ı işaret ediyorum. Hiçbir söz etmeme gerek kalmadığının farkındayım zira kalabalık, benim yerime sesini yükseltiyor.{/n} "Hainler!"
languages.original_text: {n}At last, I perceive a glint of understanding and willingness to listen on their pale faces. I point to Furnace, Rot, and Rapier, and I know that no words are necessary as the crowd speaks out for me:{/n} "Traitors!"
